description: Lists all the nodes in a kdb cluster.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: A unique name for the cluster.

nested_items.name: nodes
nested_items.description: A list of nodes associated with the cluster.

nested_items.name: nodeId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the node.

nested_items.name: availabilityZoneId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the availability zones where subnets for the environment are created.

nested_items.name: launchTime
nested_items.description: The time when a particular node is started. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the cluster nodes.
RUNNING --- The node is actively serving.
PROVISIONING --- The node is being prepared.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates where a results page should begin.
